content.prompt: Which of the following best summarizes the advice given by Frederick William in the second paragraph?

choices.label: Cultivate good relations with your neighbors in case of disputes.
Keep a strong army to exploit the weakness of rival states.
Use disputes between the princes and the Holy Roman Emperor to your advantage.
Back down when confronted by rival states in order to avoid war.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
